content.raw:
It seems that I don't have the `Gazebo/*` materials (neither `Gazebo/Grey` or `Gazebo/OrangeTransparent`). 

After receiving [this](#!/osrf/gzweb/src/6a88dcb01a2cf939b330484c07953fd90e791743/gz3d/src/gziface.js?at=default#cl-45) message, `this.material` contains some materials, but no Gazebo ones. But by the time it reaches [here](#!/osrf/gzweb/src/6a88dcb01a2cf939b330484c07953fd90e791743/gz3d/src/gziface.js?at=default#cl-874), the Gazebo materials are not parsed, since they're not there.

So I think my Gazebo installation is bad. I couldn't find the `gazebo/media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material` file where the materials are supposed to come. Actually I couldn't find the `gazebo/media/` directory...

I should also note that `gzclient` shows the orange collision visuals.
content.html:
It seems that I don't have the Gazebo/* materials (neither Gazebo/Grey or Gazebo/OrangeTransparent).

After receiving this message, this.material contains some materials, but no Gazebo ones. But by the time it reaches here, the Gazebo materials are not parsed, since they're not there.

So I think my Gazebo installation is bad. I couldn't find the gazebo/media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material file where the materials are supposed to come. Actually I couldn't find the gazebo/media/ directory...

I should also note that gzclient shows the orange collision visuals.
